mission: Mobilize awareness and action to protect the Great Salt Lake—showcasing research, stories, and simple steps students can take right now.
hero: With federal protection and funding, the lake can avoid further degradation and pollution. Your voice matters.

posts.title: Why National Park Designation?
posts.body: National Park status can unlock federal protection, funding, and long‑term stewardship. This app shares research and actions you can take to support the cause.

letterTemplate.subject: Support National Park designation for the Great Salt Lake
letterTemplate.body:
Dear Representative/Official,

I am writing to express my support for designating the Great Salt Lake as a National Park. Federal protection and funding would help safeguard this unique ecosystem, protect public health, and ensure responsible access for education and recreation. Please champion the studies, legislation, and interagency coordination required to move this forward.

Thank you for your leadership.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
[City, State]
